snippet: A state judge has recommended an inquiry into accusations that a former prosecutor concealed evidence in a trial that wrongfully sent a man to prison for nearly 25 years.
abstract: Texas Judge Sid Harle recommends inquiry into accusations that former county prosecutor Ken Anderson, who is now a judge, concealed evidence in trial that wrongfully sent Michael Morton to prison for nearly 25 years.
lead_paragraph: A state judge has recommended an inquiry into accusations that a former prosecutor concealed evidence in a trial that wrongfully sent a man to prison for nearly 25 years.
